THIS PAGE IS UNDER CONSTRUCTION Hi, welcome to my page! My name is Rohan and I am a fifth year graduate student in the ECE department at Carnegie Mellon University in Pittsburgh. I am broadly interested in signal processing and interdisciplinary work drawing from tools in machine learning, information theory and optimization.
